description: HKBN Statement data extraction (Final Unified Schema). This schema forces a single, standardized structure for all charges, including nested keys, to ensure consistent CSV output.

provider.description: Name of the telecom provider. MUST be 'Hong Kong Broadband Network'.

__filename.description: The filename of the source PDF document.

customer_name.description: The standardized key for the company name in English.

account_number.description: The standardized key for the PPS/Account Number (9-digit number).

invoice_number.description: The standardized key for the invoice number. HKBN bills do not have this, so the value should be null.

invoice_date.description: The standardized key for the issue date of the statement, in YYYY-MM-DD format.

payment_due_date.description: The standardized key for the payment due date in YYYY-MM-DD format. Can be null if 'N/A'.

billing_summary.description: A standardized object for the summary of charges, payments, and balances.

previous_bill_amount.description: Standardized key. Corresponds to 'Previous Charges' on the statement.

payment_received.description: Standardized key. Corresponds to 'Payment'. Preserve the sign (usually negative).

balance_forwarded.description: Standardized key. Corresponds to 'Previous Charges Outstanding'.

current_charges.description: Standardized key. Corresponds to 'Total Current Charges'.

total_amount_due.description: Standardized key. Corresponds to 'Statement Balance'. Preserve the sign.

service_details.description: A single, unified array for ALL charge details. Both 'Mobile Services Charges' and 'Other Charges' MUST be combined into this array.

service_number.description: Standardized key. The 8-digit phone number. For 'Other Charges', this MUST be parsed from the description string.

user_name.description: The standardized key for the user's name. Not applicable for HKBN, so the value should be null.

subtotal.description: The subtotal for a group of charges. For individual 'Other Charges' items, this can be null.

charge_items.description: A standardized array for individual line items.

description.description: Standardized key. The description of the charge.

period.description: Standardized key. The service period, in YYYY/MM/DD - YYYY/MM/DD format.

amount.description: Standardized key. The charge amount. Negative for discounts/refunds.
